title: Home Page
text: Welcome to my personal website—where business meets data, creativity, and entrepreneurship. I’m a DCU Business Studies student specializing in Data Analytics, founder of a vintage clothing business, and actively involved in my family’s retail business, Curtis & Dunne. Dive in to discover my projects, interests, and insights, or get in touch to collaborate!

title: About
text:
Shane Curtis’ Website.
Welcome! I’m Shane Curtis, a passionate student and entrepreneur currently pursuing a degree in Business Studies with a specialisation in Data Analytics at Dublin City University. Blending my analytical skills and entrepreneurial spirit, I’ve launched and successfully grown a vintage clothing business specialising in American collegiate apparel and vintage sportswear. Additionally, I’ve been deeply involved with Curtis & Dunne, my family’s owned menswear retail business known for exceptional customer service and community engagement.
Beyond my entrepreneurial endeavours, I’m dedicated to continuous learning, recently diving into Python, cloud computing, and data visualization tools like Power BI. My approach combines rigorous analytics with creative problem-solving, helping businesses leverage data-driven strategies to boost performance and customer engagement.
Whether it’s coding a new feature for my website, refining growth strategies for Curtis & Dunne, or exploring investment opportunities in emerging markets, I consistently seek new challenges. This website is not only a portfolio but also a reflection of my journey, ambitions, and commitment to innovation. Feel free to reach out—I’m always eager to collaborate, learn, and exchange ideas!
